ecis.description: Leading European conference for Information Systems research

amcis.description: Major Americas conference for Information Systems, more applied focus

hicss.description: Multidisciplinary conference covering IS, CS, and system sciences

aom.description: Premier management conference with OCIS division for IS research

informs.description: Operations research and management science conference

dsi.name: Decision Sciences Institute Annual Meeting
dsi.description: Decision sciences conference with IS track

chi.description: Premier HCI conference, ACM SIGCHI sponsored

neurips.name: Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems
neurips.description: Top machine learning and computational neuroscience conference

icml.description: Premier machine learning conference, IMLS flagship

iclr.description: Top venue for deep learning and representation learning research
